overview: The story revolves around a valuable silver deposit, located between two ranches. Villain Lash Bender cooks up a scheme to gain control of both ranches so that he may have a clear field to the silver lode.
tagline: Bullets singin'...rhythms wingin'...romance swingin'...to the tune of barking six-guns in a blizzard of hot lead!
title: Blazing Six Shooters
